title: You Deserve A Beautiful Home
posting_body: Check out these AMAZING deals located in the heart of J-Town!
We offer 2 bedroom, 1.5 bath & 1 bedroom, 1 bath newly renovated apartments in nice community that has a year around indoor pool and gym!
These apartments also features washer/dryer connections, as well!!!
This property is located near restaurant, churches, schools, shopping and much more.
to view one of our units TODAY!!!
Application fee is $50 per adult and $150 administration fee!
It takes 72 (or less) for everything to come back and get you approved!!
PETS ALLOWED (certain aggressive breed restrictions apply)
Our office is located at 292 Stoke on Trent St. We are open Monday-Friday 9-6, Saturday 10-5, Sunday 1-5 Please call
Short Term Leases available 3 month, 6 month and 9 month
•	Marble counter tops in bathrooms and kitchen
